title: Announcement, Out There Doing It, 1989
signed: Signature imprinted in black, center, left, running downward, sideways: Design: EDWARD FELLA AGENDA
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black across upper third of sheet: A series of lectures and discussions by independent practioners in Los Angeles./ January 30: Franflin D. Israel/ February 13: Aks Runo Central Office of Architecture/ February 27: Johnson/ Favoro Michele Sae e/ March 27: Ron McCoy Norman/ Milar/ April 10: Neil Denari Holt, Hinshaw, Pfau, & Jones; center, running upward, diagonally: A series of lectures and discussions by independent practioners in Los Angeles.; across lower third of sheet at various angles: Monday evenings/ Time: All events will be held on Monday evenings, Monday evenings.  at 7:30 p.m./ Monday evenings/ 1989/ Location:/ The Shindler House/ 835 North Kings Road/ West Hollywood/ Admission is free to Forum Forum Members* Members.  (but seating is limited, so please call to please call to reserve places reserve places)/ Non-members may attend on a space available/ basis, with the exception of January 30 which will be for members [Admission is free to Forum Members.]* forum and new members only.  Admission for non-members is $7.50 per event./ Membership in the Forum* is open to any interested individual.  The annual membership fee is $35.00/ For further information and reservations contact:/ Aaron Betsky (938 6826) or Christian Hubert (389 6730).; center right edge, running downward, sideways: OUT THERE DOING/ IT; lower right edge, running downward, sideways: Forum for/ Los Angeles Forum for Architecture and Urban Design/ 3454 West First Street/ Los Angeles CA 90004/ -213-389-6730
Verso: lower left edge, running upward, sideways: Los Angeles Forum for Architecture and Urban Design/ 3454 West First Street/ Los Angeles CA 90004/ -213-389-6730    

*Word(s) runs upward, sideways, perpendicular to rest of phrase.
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black for lecture series sponsored by Los Angeles Forum for Architecture and Urban design, designed to be mailed.  Text in a variety of sizes, styles, and images throughout.  
Recto: Across upper third of sheet, text giving dates, names of speakers.  Across center, small random images, including fingers, boat, abstract designs.  Across lower third of sheet, text at various angles giving times, location, contact and additional information.  Right edge, running downward, sideways, series title and sponsor information.  
Verso: Across entire sheet, abstract curvilinear designs.  Lower left quadrant, running upward, sideways, return address information.

participants.person_name: Los Angeles Forum for Architecture and Urban Design

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Out There Doing It, 1989. Offset lithograph on gray paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-14.
